name: Chattering Bones (Klepetajuće kosti)
description:
Non-Commercial Use.

Chattering Bones is joint project me (second project) and colleagues Goran Lochert in Unity education - Pismo Novska Croatia.

Game is internal joke originated.

Link: Original Game

Game description:

This endless runner game example (Trash Dash) is optimised for mobile, it shows the use of object pooling, origin reset, asset bundles, additive scene loading and a curved world shader.
